quiz.question: Which two companies were central in the personal digital music player battle with portable devices?
Which corporation bought Instagram's rival, affecting competition in social media?
Which social media acquisition by Facebook (Meta) in 2012 affected rivalry with which photo-sharing app?
Which two companies are central to the iconic "Cola Wars" rivalry?
Which retail giant challenged Amazon with aggressive online expansion and store integration?
Which major 2000s lawsuit involved which pair contesting search advertising and browser integration?
options: AOL and Google over ad placements
Google and Microsoft over search and browser practices
quiz.answer: Google and Microsoft over search and browser practices

quiz.question: Which beverage companies' rivalry included taste tests called the "Pepsi Challenge"?

options: Pepsi Classic returned after New Pepsi
Coca-Cola Classic returned after New Coke
quiz.answer: Coca-Cola Classic returned after New Coke
